Welcome to the November 2021 Edition 
of the Justia Insights Client Newsletter!

In this month’s edition of Justia Insights, learn more about our new, free membership program for lawyers: Justia Connect! Get the latest news on changes in Local Services Ads (LSAs), discover the questions lawyers should be asking before hiring a PPC consultant, and get tips for marketing a criminal defense practice. Catch up on the latest in legal and technology news, and take a peek at what our team has been doing over the past month.

Did You Know?

Background Checks No Longer Required for Lawyer LSAs

In a recent announcement, Google confirmed that lawyers no longer need to go through an additional background check to achieve "Google Screened" status for their Local Services Ads (LSAs). Learn more about this change and what it means for lawyers.

Meet Our Team

Justians Get Spooky

In keeping with our annual tradition, the Justia Team participated in our annual Halloween celebration and costume contest: The Ghoulie Awards. Some costumes were scary, some were silly, but everyone had a great time getting into the Halloween spirit.

A Pug’s Tale

Rest in Peace, Little Sheba

Last month we had to say goodbye to the original Hug Pug, Little Sheba. She was part of our family for over 17.5 years. The wrinkles on her forehead appropriately formed a smiley face, as she brought joy to so many lives. We are lucky to have had her in our lives as long as we did and we miss her so much.
